text: Théophile "Théo" van Rysselberghe (23 November 1862 – 14 December 1926) was a Belgian painter. He played an important role in the neo-impressionist and pointilist art movements. He was a founding member of Les XX. Category:1862 births Category:1926 deaths Category:Belgian painters Category:People from Ghent
title: Théo van Rysselberghe
